query:
UPDATE owners
            SET
                email = NULL,
                phone = NULL,
                address = NULL,
                city = NULL,
                postal_code = NULL,
                country = NULL,
                first_name = 'Anonymized',
                last_name = 'User',
                is_anonymized = TRUE,
                anonymized_at = NOW(),
                updated_at = NOW()
            WHERE id = $1 AND is_anonymized = FALSE
